data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Bijelo Polje, Montenegro, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bijelo Polje, Montenegro

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 110 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 41,700 people living in Bijelo Polje, Montenegro. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 30,856 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Turk people.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Bijelo Polje to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Bijelo Polje, Montenegro to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Bijelo Polje, Montenegro.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.
